page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: Down Brickyard Lane,Melton, there is a factory called{CAPPER PASS.}Capper Pass is a company that smelts metals to produce mainly tin, but also lead, copper, zinc, antimony, nickel, bismuth, indium, solder, gold and silver. Capper Pass employs 880 people,600 are on shift work,150 are engineers, electricians etc., and about 100 office staff. The company keeps going 24 hours a day,365 days a year, making about 200 tons of metals a day. Specialising in tin, they make one tenth of the world's tin, and over the next year they hope to increase by 40% to make one eighth. To smelt metal you need furnaces. Capper Pass has 3 blast, 1 electric, 5 reverberatory and 2 rotary furnaces.
